definitions.definition: to move someone or something from one place, vehicle, person, or group to another:
examples: He has been transferred to a psychiatric hospital.

definitions.definition: to arrange for someone to answer phone calls received on one telephone on another telephone:
examples: I'll be upstairs, so could you transfer my phone calls up there, please?

definitions.definition: to change to a different job, team, place of work, etc., or to make someone do this:
examples: After a year he transferred to University College, Dublin.

definitions.definition: to make something the legal property of another person:
examples: She transferred the house to her daughter before she died.

definitions.definition: the movement of something or someone from one place, position, etc. to another:
